group_1.textLeft: For real, the heck's wrong with him?
Hey, Miss Prez! Listen to me!
That old dude who teaches me PE told me my@skirt was too short.
Has he got nothing better to do than looking@at girls' skirts?!

group_1.textRight: Your skirt's length looks okay to me...

group_1.textLeft: Actually? He had a ruler with him, and when he@measured me, it turned out to be perfectly fine!

group_1.textRight: ...Well, that sounds overkill, just a bit.

group_1.textLeft: I know, right?!
What's more, I was late for first period PE 'cause@of that.
And guess what, he was mad at me for being@late!
Like, dude, I was late BECAUSE *YOU* STOPPED@ME AND MADE ME CHANGE!

group_1.textRight: Very well. I will discuss this matter with the@Student Council.

group_1.textLeft: Thanks a lot, Prez! Much appreciated!

group_1.textRight: Let me know if anything else happens.

group_1.textLeft: Sure thing!

group_1.narration: "Told ya, the new Student Council Prez's real cool."
"She actually listens to us and responds to our needs...@We can truly rely on her."
"Ever since she became President, the atmosphere in the school@has been getting better, little by little."
"Oh well, the teachers are still as annoying as usual."
"That girl who's always with her seems pretty friendly, too."
"A secretary supporting the Student Council President...@What a great combination."

group_1.textLeft: *Sigh*...
No, it's just... I've been having many troubles@lately...
Yes... When I became the Student Council@President,
I promised to give all students the freedom to wear@their hair any way they wanted, remember?
But when we began to adjust the school rules...
All of a sudden, the Parents' Association started@protesting.
That's why, I've been having a bit of a dispute with@the teachers...

group_1.textRight: Really... I wish they'd stop butting in.

group_1.textLeft: On top of that, I also have to figure out what to@do with Juri Ooba...
There are a lot of personal problems I must@deal with...

group_1.textRight: Juri Ooba... That pesky Magical Girl...
I was surprised to find out that Senpai had@entrusted you,
who's been a Magical Girl for shorter than myself,@with dealing with that person.
Because it's an unexpectedly enormous task...
Hikaru will support you with all her might!

group_1.textLeft: Heheh, you're very reliable.
Since I want to entrust you, Hikaru,
with an important job concerning her...
By all means, I will be counting on you.

group_1.textRight: An important job... What d'you mean by that?

group_1.textLeft: We'll talk about that later, during our strategy@meeting with Senpai...
[se:7201_detect_magic][chara:102103:effect_ef_adv_01]...?!
Yes.
Let's defeat it quickly,
so that we won't be late for our meeting with@Senpai...
